activities: Quality Data Services Inc. (QDS)is a Clinical Research Organization which provides a wide range of services supporting the research and development of our biopharmaceutical and device clients globally.  As all corporate offices are based in the United States, QDS will transfer personal data about its partners, suppliers, and clinical trial participants from members of the European Union and our affiliates in the United States.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Human resource, clinical trial data, clinical trial participatants and investigators, suppliers and partner information in all formats, including electronically stored and manually processsed information.
recoursemech: EU Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC)
